_header: At a sermon there I sat / A comely clerk I heard craven
Title(s): A luytel sermoun of good edificacioun
_description: Friar Henry, ‘A luytel sermoun of good edificacioun’ — ten 8-line stanzas

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
At A sarmoun þer I seetA comely clerk Ich herde
                    crauenWyse wordes he þer speekÞe Mon þat wolde in herte
                    hauen…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…& ben I haried in to helle pyneTo Bale þer neuer ne
                    bote nis nonHe þat al þis world schal demenÞou Rihtwys
                    lord þou rewe on Mon. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Note:
In monorhyming quatrains; written in half-lines per line in
                    MS.
